类 BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.mastergaurav.android.common.view.BaseActivity
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, IViewActivity, IResponseListener
    直接已知子类:
    HomeActivity, LoginActivity, SplashActivity

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements IResponseListener, IViewActivity
    TODO: Create an implementation of IViewActivity and delegate all calls to the impl.

    Advantage: Can reuse the implementation working with ListActivity, TabActivity, NativeActivity etc.
